channel.title: Help searching through all files
channel.description: Okay so im still creating a server and im following a few tutorials; and they mention stuff like go in potions.java or somthing anyway, is there anyway for me to search through my whole client folder to find it? okay thanks and i dont mean like CTRL + F like search through them all files.

item.title: Help searching through all files
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

no, you must search through all of them with ctrl + f

Read full topic
